plot: The world of Safe Light 19 is a vicious place, where dust from the comet strike has blocked the light from the sun, creating days that are filled with a grey light and nights that are pitch black.
plot_en: The world of Safe Light 19 is a vicious place, where dust from the comet strike has blocked the light from the sun, creating days that are filled with a grey light and nights that are pitch black.
plot_es: The world of Safe Light 19 is a vicious place, where dust from the comet strike has blocked the light from the sun, creating days that are filled with a grey light and nights that are pitch black.
title: Safelight 19
